scheduler

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store data about an individual course entry that was pulled from the HTML calendar.
    Author:
    Jacob Walton, Marshal Brummel, Alan Sisouphone
